item.description:
SAT JAN 22 at 8 pm ART at the Playhouse on Park with Pre and Post Party


Serge has just indulged his penchant for modern art by buying a large, expensive and almost blank white painting. Marc is horrified, and their relationship suffers considerable strain. Yvan is caught in the middle, trying to please and mollify each of them. From beginning to end, Art is a dazzling array of crackling language and a witty and intelligent exploration of the complexities of friendship and a provocative and profound debate about the rules that dictate art.

It won the Olivier and the Tony Award for best play.
“ 'Art' belongs to a tradition that once flourished but is seldom represented these days: the sleek, pleasant comedy of manners with an intellectual veneer that allows audiences to relax…a limber comic exercise in escalating tensions.”
– New York Times

Directed by Drama Desk Award Nominated Director Tom Ridgely
Pre Party across the street at Chengdu Asian Bistro and Lounge

***ART Won the Olivier and the Tony Award for Best Play ****
FREE PARKING
Pre and Post Party with
The CT Theatre Group

Tickets are $25.00
Advance Ticket Discount - $22.50 available at http://www.CTTheatreG...

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119


Pick up your ticket before the show at the PREPARTY with the CT Theatre Group,
or at the will call window

Pre-Party and Post Party info will be emailed to all ticket holders


Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... or call (860) 987-7888
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet before and after the show to extend the party Details will be emailed to all Ticket Holders
